subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Jacques Rogge, the president of the International Olympic Committee, said pollution in Beijing would not endanger the health of athletes, although their Olympic performance might suffer. Rogge also said during his visit to Singapore on Saturday that he saw no momentum toward an Olympic boycott over political issues. The Tibet protests and other human rights issues had led activists to call for boycotts.
